name: KITT.IO
description:
Can you gain the biggest kitten following?



Collect kittens from across several different maps, steal followers from other cats and gather the biggest following of kittens possible to win!

• Collect kitten followers
• Steal followers from other cats
• Gather the biggest following possible
• Unlock new hats and cats to play as

Use the mouse, the keyboard or a gamepad to control your cat. Run up to unclaimed kittens to have them follow you, or run up to cats following others with less followers than you to steal their kittens. The cat with the most followers at the end of the round wins. Winning rounds allows you to earn gems in order to unlock new skins, colours and clothing to customise your cat.
